data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Soufrière. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Soufrière, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Soufrière that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Soufrière, Saint Lucia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Soufrière to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Soufrière, Saint Lucia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Soufrière
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Soufrière, Soufrière, Saint Lucia.
Over 5.1 percent of the people of Soufrière are far from Jesus.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Soufrière, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Soufrière. Through your servants plant 1 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
